item.description: Experience 2019- Psychologist (part time) HRC Group Hungary Short psychological counseling in English and in Hungarian. Mental health hotline speaker. 2018- Career Advisor (full time) OFA Nonprofit Ltd. Involvement in a project designed to provide guidance for the unemployed and workfare workers. Personal career and psychological counseling in Hungarian and in English (including but not limited to CV writing, preparing for job interviews, teaching job searching techniques, identifying and strengthening personal values, developing clear goals, developing career resilience and adaptability).
